General.Name: Isras Investment Company Ltd
General.Description: Isras Investment Company Ltd operates in the real estate sector in Israel. It engages in the residential and construction projects. The company was founded in 1950 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel. Isras Investment Company Ltd is a subsidiary of Arad Investment & Industrial Development Ltd.

6.Name: Mr. Avitar  Cohen
6.Title: VP and Mang. of Sales & Marketing
